pullRequest.title: Bump ES version to 7.8.0
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #, if available:
Description of changes:
This PR bumps the ES version to 7.8.0. To fix various compile errors after the upgrade, I did the following:
First, rename various ES functions. For example, getAliasAndIndexLookup is renamed to getIndicesLookup.
Second, the license header check failed. I add an AL license in the licenseHeaders task.
Third, I removed all metadata related classes as we are not using them.
Testing done:

gradle build pass. Will do more testing when we have the docker image.

By submitting this pull request, I confirm that you can use, modify, copy, and redistribute this contribution, under the terms of your choice.

commit.message:
Bump ES version to 7.8.0

This PR bumps the ES version to 7.8.0. To fix various compile errors after the upgrade, I did the following:
First, rename various ES functions. For example, getAliasAndIndexLookup is renamed to getIndicesLookup.
Second, the license header check failed. I add an AL license in the licenseHeaders task.
Third, I removed all metadata related classes as we are not using them.

Testing done:
* gradle build pass. Will do more testing when we have the docker image.

nodes.bodyText: question. what happens to deletedetector? is it replaced with something new?
